SE450: To Hand In [1/1]

  • Download file:hw-03/bin/hw3-src.zip.
  • See the code [source].
  • View the public javadoc.
  • View the package-private javadoc.
  • Complete the incomplete classes (you may wish to paste in some of your hw-02 solution).
  • Modify your unit tests so that they pass.
  • Re-write the integration test shop.main.TEST1.

Note: In order to implement the undo/redo capability, I have added a couple of package-private methods to InventorySet and changed the return type on others.

Look at file:hw-03/src/shop/main/TEST2.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]

You can run the program at the command line by typing: 

java -jar bin\hw3.jar

or 

java -cp bin\hw3.jar shop.main.Main

or 

java -cp bin\classes shop.main.Main
